dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 26 ATS: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Thune submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

section.text: That the following shall constitute the majority partyâ€™s membership on the following committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen:

header.committee-name: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Boozman (Chair), Mr. McConnell, Mr. Hoeven, Ms. Ernst, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Justice, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Thune, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Moran.

header.committee-name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Lee (Chair), Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Risch, Mr. Daines, Mr. Cotton, Mr. McCormick, Mr. Justice, Mr. Cassidy, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Hoeven.
Mr. Scott (FL) (Chair), Mr. McCormick, Mr. Justice, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Scott (SC).

header.committee-name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Ernst (Chair), Mr. Risch, Mr. Paul, Mr. Scott (SC), Mr. Young, Mr. Hawley, Mr. Budd, Mr. Curtis, Mr. Justice, Mrs. Blackburn.
